entry.title: Mixed
entry.summary:
Vendor: Collider
Type: Beer
Price: 27.00 - 92.00 (3 variants)

LAGER

Water, Malted Barley, Wheat, Hops, Yeast, Unwind Blend (L-Theanine, Lion’s Mane, Ashwagandha) 

For Allergens see ingredients in bold. Store in a Cool dry place. Protect from heat.

 

SESSION IPA

Water, Malted Barley, Wheat, Hops, Yeast, Unwind Blend (L-Theanine, Lion’s Mane, Ashwagandha) 

For Allergens see ingredients in bold. Store in a Cool dry place. Protect from heat.

 

VEGAN              GLUTEN FREE        NATURAL INGREDIENTS

SPL

SPL

We ship all orders from our UK warehouse and only ship to the UK and Northern Ireland currently.

 

STANDARD SHIPPING 

This costs £3.95 (or is free with orders of £50 and more) and will typically arrive 2-3 working days after order placed. 

NEXT WORKING DAY SHIPPING 

This costs £6.95 and will arrive the next working day as long as order is placed before 1pm. 

SPL

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE 

If you aren't happy with the product we will refund 100% of your money. 

This only applies to beer and you need return at least 75% of the cans back to us (e.g. returning 18 cans from a 24 pack). This does not have to be in original packaging but you would have to pay for the shipping cost back to Collider.

This does not apply to merch, which would have to be returned in full for a full refund.

To arrange please get in touch with hello@drinkcollider.com 

SPL

 

Collider is suitable for:

Vegans

Gluten-free 

Lactose-intolerant 

Keto-friendly 

 

Please note that if you are on anti-depressant medication, it should be safe for you to consumer but always check with your GP first. 

SPL

GLUTEN FREE

Although Collider contains wheat and barley, we use a special process to remove the gluten so is safe for those with gluten allergies and intolerances. 

HOPS

Although it is incredibly rare, some people are intolerant to hops. Collider, being a beer, contains hops, so consume with caution if you are intolerant.

SPL

Our ingredients are sourced from the following places: 

 

Wheat, Barley, Water: UK

Hops: USA, Germany 

Adaptogens: various (predominantly China, India)

To manage your subscription. Click the account button at the top right of the window and login using the email address you used to place your order (you may be asked to login using an SMS code sent to your phone).

Then click 'Manage Subscription' in the top left of the window. From there you can skip an order, pause you subscription, change your beer style, amend frequency or cancel your subscription. 

SPL
